Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Christy
Reviews.Content: This item came as it was reported to. it was nice. I am looking forward to have records of memories taking pictures with it..

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Ninzani
Reviews.Content: i think that this cameraa has good mega pixels high quality not used and other good features that you can find the only thing i dont like is that it dosent come in a usb cable.

10 MP
2.4" LCD Display
Waterproof to 10' Underwater
